data.title: Animal rights: Supreme Court ducks challenge to California ban on foie gras
data.description: Duck and goose farmers have challenged the California ban on foie gras three times at the Supreme Court. The latest denial means the ban will stand.
data.snippet:
Animal rights: Supreme Court ducks challenge to California ban on foie gras

data.title: The Supreme Court’s ruling on humane treatment of pigs could catalyze a wave of new animal welfare laws
data.description: The Supreme Court has upheld a controversial California law requiring pork sold in-state to be humanely raised, no matter where it’s produced. Pork producers ...

data.title: Supreme Court sides with California on animal welfare law that could have impact beyond bacon
data.description: At issue is a 2018 ballot initiative that bans the sale of bacon and other pork products in California unless the pigs are housed in larger pens.
data.snippet:
Supreme Court sides with California on animal welfare law that could have impact beyond bacon
